attributes.action: We would like David Cameron please  to step down
attributes.background: David  cameron to step down as a leader for this country, as he cant be trust as a truthful leader of this country, and why waist money on EU leaflets when his already wasting money in the EU , its our  money the people of the UK ,

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
